title: The Fairies Encyclopedia
description: With this whimsical guide, readers can join the Disney Fairies and enter the enchanting world of Pixie Hollow, where believing is just the beginning!Disney Fairies: The Fairies Encyclopedia delves into the lives of Tinker Bell and her friends, exploring characters and locations. Each page is bursting with new information and little-known facts about the magical creatures. A fun, eyecatching design, original glittering cover art, and lively text breathe new life into character poses and film stills from the Disney Fairies movies, making this the one book no Tinker Bell fan should be without.
author: D.K. Publishing
